Locke Boarding House Museum.knownFor: “ A rare find off the beaten path ” Reviewed September 14, 2016 The museum is actually located in the tiny town of Locke, which does not have its own zip code. Use Walnut Grove 95690 for GPS location. Locke just celebrated its 100th anniversary in 2015. it is the only living rural Chinese town in America.
